title: NGS
lyrics:
I think about you all the time
Can't spare a thought to find a rhyme
And every night I dream of you
There's nothing that I'd rather do
What is it makes me feel this way
It must be the sweet things that you say
Opened up my eyes to see
Now all those sappy love songs
They make sense to me
I think about you all the time
You're cool you're smart you're sweet you're mine
And every day I pray for you
There's nothing that I'd rather do

title: Run
lyrics:
You can only run for so long before you collapse
You can only fight so hard before its relapsed
When you fall down who'll pick you off the ground?
When you've burned every bridge along the way
If I could take my eyes off of myself
I wonder what I'd see
Difference in my perspective and reality
I will not be the one to fall
I will be strong I will stand tall
I've never felt this free before
Opened my eyes you opened the door
For the first time
I feel fine
I feel alive
For the first time
It's all right
I feel alive
I will not run away from you
I'll do what you ask me to do
I will not be the one to fall
I will be strong I will stand tall
I will not run
I will not hide
I will not keep this inside
I will not run
I will not hide
I will not keep this inside

title: Trees
lyrics:
Trees
Some are big some are small some are short some are tall
I love trees

title: Justen Other Day
lyrics:
You blow me away
Shaken I awaken to find another day
You startle me
Motivation declaration I say
I say I believe
'Cause when I think about the chances that I've blown
I swear I'll never fail again
And when I think about the things that I've been shown
This secret I just can't retain
If I had a quarter for every time I walked away
Said today's not the day it will still be okay
I'd be rich in money poor in what counts
The world offers trivial amounts

title: Counterproductive
lyrics:
I light a fire just to put it out
Hoping that this accomplishment will satisfy requirements
And numb this feeling of failure
I fall down just to pick myself up
Succesfully I walk away
It's been a productive day
Of losing my mind
Cause there are times when I don't feel very smart
Like my brain is a lot smaller than my heart
The choices that I've made have rarely been the best
Just throw me in the corner with the rest
Maybe what I've failed to see is
I've been concentrating on me
Instead of looking up to your open arms
No, it doesn't seem that far

title: Just 13
lyrics:
When we were just 13 we
Were told what to believe in
It didn't matter to us
What we were seen as
But then at 17 we
Cared about being seen and
We lost the freedom of our youth
'Cause when we were kids
Nothing could go wrong
And everything was fun
'Cause we all just got along
The world was open wide
We had our hopes and dreams
Now it's all falling apart at the seams
As we keep getting older
This world keeps getting colder
We tried out best but they gave us
The cold shoulder
Things aren't the way they used to be
I'm opressed for what I believe
Ignorance will never see
Don't you see that I'm not really ready yet
Just let me stay right where I am
'Cause I'm still just a boy
In the body in the body of man

title: Like TV
lyrics:
I guess I've always wondered why life can't be more like TV
Everything is perfect it's the ideal fantasy
There's nothing that lasts longer than a 30-minute conflict
Wish everything that sucks could end that quick that quick
That quick yeah
Everything on TV always seems to work out so ideally
Everything on TV's the way it should be
Everything on TV seems to work out so ideally
Everything on TV's the way it should be
The way it should be
I wish I had a laugh track to go along
Wish I was like TV and had my own theme song
I wish that I could drive nice cars and travel far away
In 30 minutes a day
As I turn on my television set
I watch the screen and I forget
The things that didn't go my way
They all just fade away

title: Let Go
lyrics:
Just say what you're gonna say
It doesn't matter anyway
Judge my heart my soul my all
But I will not fall down to where you stand
Instead I'll offer you my hand
You only see with hate and fear
I'll move on but you'll stay here
You see with hate I'll see with love
You will fall down I'll rise above
I'll be just fine you'll feel your pain
My thoughts are mine
You'll be ashamed

title: Transparent
lyrics:
As the morning fog sets in
I know I won't see you grin
With so much buried within
Soul's so dark you can't see in
Dark you can't see in
Sometimes pain's your only friend
The only one who understands
That you're so consumed with fear
That you'll never draw near
To the place
You find truth
You should know
We can see the inside of you
And this light, it burns so bright
But it's lost here tonight
Spent your life running away
Lost yourself along the way
Lose convictions in denial
You've failed every trial
Failed every trial
Find comfort in misery
Drowning in your sympathy
Longing only to be free
Praying one day you'll see
The place
You find truth
You should know
We can see inside of you
And this light, it burns so bright
But it's lost in your life
Your life.

title: Hero
lyrics:
You can spend your life in
In the passenger seat
And watch it all fly by
Or you can take the wheel
Shift into gear
And drive along your own lines
I will not let my life fly by
I will not waste my time
I will not just sit on the fence
Regardless of the consequence oh yeah
Wake up
It's time to save the world
Wake up
It's time to save the world
Stand up stand out
Its time to be a hero
Stand up stand out its time to make your stand
Stand up stand out
Its time to be a hero
Stand up stand out
Cause its time to save the world
You can just succumb to socialization
And fall right into line
Or you can be yourself
Go along your own lines
And yourself redefined
I will not just fall into line
My actions will be mine
I will not just sit on the fence
Regardless of the consequence oh yeah

title: Lost For Words
lyrics:
You're never there
Anyway
Did you think we were ok
And I don't know
What's left to say
Except I wish that you would stay
I don't know
What I can do
I'm so sick of chasing you
I don't know
Anymore
Please don't walk through that door
